items.name: Kashmiri Dum Aloo
items.description: Baby potatoes roasted and cooked in a tangy, spicy and flavourful yogurt based gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Kashmiri Wazwan Pulao
items.description: A humble and comforting dish from the state of Kashmir. Lamb pieces cooked with garlic, fried onions, whole spices, fennel seeds, nuts and long basmati rice. Served with a side of yogurt raita + papad + achar

items.name: Poha
items.description: Maharashtrian stype poha is made from flattened rice stir-fried with a blend of spices, potato, peanuts, and garnished with lemon juice and grated coconut.

items.name: Chicken Kheema Pav
items.description: A popular Indian street food dish that consists of minced chicken cooked with green peas, a blend of aromatic spices and served with pav (buns) and garnished with fresh cilantro and chopped onions that makes for a flavorful and filling meal.

items.name: Jodhpuri Kabuli
items.description: An exotic dish made with layers of rice & spiced vegetable gravy cooked in yogurt topped with croutons & dry fruits. Served with a side of yogurt raita + papad

items.name: Chicken Banjara Curry
items.description: A popular Indian dish that originated in the state of Rajasthan. It consists of tender pieces of chicken cooked in a rich and flavorful tomato-based sauce with a blend of aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Bread Pakoda
items.description: Mashed potato mixed with spices & chillies stuffed between bread slices dipped in chickpea batter and fried for the crispy layer. Served with spicy green chutney. (2 pakodas)

items.name: Litti Chokha
items.description: A traditional dish from the Indian state of Bihar. It consists of baked balls made of whole wheat flour and stuffed with a mixture of roasted gram flour, spices, and herbs and served with a side of mashed potatoes and eggplant, along with a tangy tomato and onion chutney.

items.name: Veg Korma
items.description: Mix veggies cooked in yogurt based gravy with cramalised onion, cashew and freshly ground spices topped with fresh cream
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Kerala Beef Curry
items.description: A delicious south indian beef curry dish cooked with onion, tomato, garlic, ginger and fresh spices topped with fresh coriander and garam masala
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parotta + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Inji Puli Chicken Wings
items.description: A south Indian inspired appetizer that features crispy chicken wings coated in a tangy and spicy ginger-tamarind sauce. The dish is a perfect balance of sweet, sour, and spicy flavors.

items.name: Puttu And Kadala Curry
items.description: A comforting meal made of steamed rice flour layered with coconut and served with spicy warm black chickpea curry

items.name: Delhi Style Matar Khulche
items.description: One of the most popular street foods from Delhi. Usually sold on carts in huge brass handis (pots). It's a lip smacking vegetarian curry made with white dried peas and served with 2 flatbreads called kulcha.

items.name: Lucknowi Gosht Nihari
items.description: A slow-cooked meat stew that originated in the city of Lucknow. It is made with tender pieces of lamb that are simmered in a rich and aromatic gravy with a blend of spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Sweet Potato Tikki Chaat
items.description: A delicious and healthy Indian street food snack that consists of crispy sweet potato cutlets (tikkis) topped with a variety of chutneys, yogurt, and spices. The dish is a perfect blend of sweet, tangy, and spicy flavors that make it a popular vegetarian option for chaat lovers. (2 tikki)

items.name: Khazi Rice
items.description: A popular rice dish from the Indian state of Assam. It is made with a fragrant and flavorful rice, which is cooked with a blend of spices vegetables and garnished with different herbs.

items.name: Kathal Biryani
items.description: Jackfruit cooked with a special spice blend and layered with partially cooked basmati rice in a heavy-bottomed pot and cooked on low heat, allowing the flavors to meld together and the rice to fully cook. Served with a side of yogurt raita and papad.

items.name: Hyderabadi Chicken Biryani
items.description: A popular Indian dish originating from the city of Hyderabad. It is made with marinated chicken that is cooked with aromatic spices, layered with long-grain basmati rice and then slow-cooked to perfection. Served with a side of yogurt raita + papad

items.name: Mirchi Vada
items.description: A popular Indian street food snack that originated in Rajasthan. It consists of large green chili peppers that are stuffed with a spiced potato filling, coated in a chickpea flour batter, and then deep-fried until crispy and golden brown. Served with a side of green chutney. (4 vadas)

items.name: Gobi Ke Parathe
items.description: Indian flatbread made with a stuffing of spiced cauliflower (gobi). The cauliflower is cooked with a blend of aromatic spices, and then mashed and stuffed inside the paratha dough, which is then rolled out and cooked on a griddle until crispy and golden brown. (3 parathas)

items.name: Hyderabadi Khatti Dal
items.description: A comforting dish from Hyderabad. Lentils cooked with tamarind and tempered with garlic, dry red chillies and cumin.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + papad + side salad + achar

items.name: Hyderabadi Dum ka Murgh
items.description: A royal treat from the city of Nizams. Marinated chicken slow-cooked with aromatic spices and almonds. Served with rice or paratha, it's a dish fit for a king, with its rich and creamy texture.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Mix Vegetable Vadi
items.description: A Punjabi flavourful fantacy. A tasty bend of veggies and spices in chickpea flour is first steamed, cut into cubes and shallow fried and then tempered with sesame seeds for an extra flavour punch.

items.name: Dhaba Style Dal Kichidi
items.description: Rice, lentils, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic & chilli pressure cooked together and tempered with different spices for the flavourful taste. Served with papad. A complete comfort meal.

items.name: Dal Bhukhara
items.description: A famous Punjabi dish, made with black lentils that are slow cooked and is rich and delicious.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + papad + side salad + achar

items.name: Dhaba Style Chicken Curry
items.description: A delicious dish from the northern part of India. Chicken cooked with onion, tomato, yogurt, ginger, garlic and chilles with lip smacking spices to make this dish something to die for!
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Madhur Vada
items.description: A popular snack from the state of Karnataka. Sliced onions mixed with different spices, chillies, sesame seeds, panuts and flour is flattened and deep fried for the perfect crispyness. Served with a side of coconut chutney. (4 vadas)

items.name: Sambar Rice
items.description: A comfort meal from the south of India. Lentils and veggies cooked together with tamarind, and freshly made sambar masala tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves. Served with rice + papad

items.name: Black Eyed Peas Coconut Curry
items.description: A dish from the South of India, with black eyed peas cooked in creamy coconut based gravy with spices and  curry leaves and garnished with fresh corinader leaves.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + papad + side salad + achar

items.name: Chicken Varutharachathu
items.description: A traditional Kerala dish made with roasted coconut, spices, and chicken. A dish that is flavourful as well as comforting.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad + achar

items.name: Railway Style Cutlet
items.description: A nostalgic treat made of deep fried spicy potato. Its perfect texure of soft potato filling with a crispy outer layer. Served with spicy green chutney (4 cutlets)

items.name: Coconut Rice
items.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked in ghee with cashew, curry leaves, dried chilli and fresh coconut, tempered with mustard seeds

items.name: Sev Tamatar Sabji
items.description: A Gujarati dish made with tomatoes and spices cooked together, it's simple yet tasty. Topped with crunchy sev and garnished with some fresh corinader.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 chapatis + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Champaran Lamb Curry
items.description: A dish from the nothern part of India with spicy flavourful lamb pieces cooked together with chillies, garlic, ginger and freshly ground spies, slow cooked on low flame to perfection.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas/rice + side salad + achar

items.name: Sundal
items.description: A popular South Indian snack made with chickpeas and coconut packed with a lot of flavour.

items.name: Pongal
items.description: Rice lentils pressure cooked together and tempered with different spices, curry leaves and cashew and served with a side of coconut chutney.

items.name: Veg Schezwan Noodles
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish loaded with veggies and spices and lots of flavour
items.extra: make it a meal with veg manchurian gravy

items.name: Chicken Schezwan Noodles
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish loaded with veggies, chicken, spices lots flavour.
items.extra: make it a meal with a side of chicken manchurian gravy.

items.name: Paneer Pepper Fry
items.description: A spicy delight made with paneer and bell peppers, it's a treat hard to fight.

items.name: Soya Bean Pulao
items.description: A protein-rich meal with fragrant basmati rice and soya bean. It's a healthy wholesome meal packed with veggies and spices.
